event.title: Bristol Data Scientists Meeting
event.description:
Agenda:

6.00 pm  Arrival and drinks

6.30 pm  Presentations (followed by networking and drinks)

• Extracting Insights from Social Media using R -        Luciana Dalla Valle, Plymouth University

•  Competing on Kaggle - learning, fun and overfit if you dare - Yifan Xie, Airbus

• Statistical eBooks and the StatJR Software System -           Bill Browne, Bristol University
